Articles.Content:
90% of you will see the title and go, "Too easy, [check!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) the forum rules." Did I say I was done? No, keep reading.

I MEAN Jool and back. Go to the surface, and fly back into orbit and maybe even home.

Now by surface, I mean get close. Don't land, you get attacked by the Kraken (for those who don't know)

Example to show it isn't impossible:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1Z6BEg8iG5A?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Now the judging

"Weightless"(Lightest lander)

We are the champions! (Cheapest to go home)

WOW! (Land on a moon of Jool)

1

2

3

4

5

Now the rules.

You can use info and visual mods to the brink of the RAM limit, but no part mods!

Planes are allowed as long as they reach the requirements (Ascends to orbit)

Have to be under 3.5km over the surface.

Docking is allowed so you can assemble the lander in orbit.

You better have fun

Happy flying!

Kaboom!

P.S: I will try to get my attempt but since I'm going to Florida for spring break I have no time. I will be able to check and score your attempts in Florida, so submit as much as possible.
